name: Hall St.
tag_list: marketplace, hotels, etourism, tourism, p2p, collaborative-consumption
description: The marketplace for hotel room trading
overview:
Hall St. is the first open global Marketplace for hotel rooms, were users can buy, sell and share hotel rooms without a middleman.

A hotel room is much more than a place to stay. A hotel room has a dynamic value, the price has a high volatility, a date of liquidation and may be transferred between users that cannot use it, when they pay in advance.

This acceptance from the user´s point of view will improve the liquidity in the hotel market segment and will create new low pricing opportunities, reduced costs of distribution and introduce a new user experience.

Hall St. is ideal for business clients and leisure tourist. Hoteliers can benefit from direct connectivity with the users, in a seamless and innovative way. As Hall St. is also a community, users have a voice and a personality which allows us to offer to them several ways to save, a new way of booking and an extended travel experience.

Our mission is to transform the traditional hotel booking process into a cooler, cheaper, social and transparent experience.

Hall St. is a “first mover” and our innovative technology guarantees transactions between members, including hotel direct connectivity (Consumer to Business), room availability (sales and re-sales), name changes and payment processing (C2B, B2B & P2P).

We create and add value to both sides of every transaction between user to users and user to hotel.
